OnShift | Downtown Cleveland OH | Python Full Stack Software Engineer | All experience (and pay) levels | ONSITE

OnShift helps post acute care facilities (e.g. nursing homes) schedule and manage their hourly employees. We are a SAAS company using Python (Flask/SQL Alchemy), Postgres and other open source projects to solve real problems that prevent individuals from receiving the optimal care that they deserve. We are a truly Agile/Lean software shop that is growing extremely fast with ambitious goals. We have no expectations of Python experience, we are willing to teach the right candidates.

If this sounds interesting, shoot an email to awolfe (at) onshift (dot) com
